items.title: Enhance Buyback History with New Transactions in Roadmap ðŸš€
items.summary: This update introduces three new on-chain buyback transactions from January 31, 2026, enhancing the buyback history. It includes a $118 buyback from creator fees and two $2,250 buybacks sourced from revenue. All transactions are linked to the buyback wallet for transparency and verification.

items.title: Update Claude API Path for Consistency in Backend ðŸš€
items.summary: This update modifies the Claude API path from '/claude/chat/completions' to '/v1/chat/completions' across multiple files, including service mappings and documentation. The changes enhance clarity and ensure consistency in API usage. Additionally, the documentation has been updated to reflect these changes, providing developers with accurate examples.
